backend/main.mo: Actor managing market data storage, user preferences, snapshot caching, and filtering utilities.
backend/MarketData.mo: Defines MarketData record including symbol, price, volume, and direction.
backend/Theme.mo: Defines Theme type with darkNeon and cyberGlow variants.
backend/UserPreferences.mo: Defines user preference types including favourites, theme, alerts, and language.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mappings between features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with extensive PWA meta tags, splash screens, and icons.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, display settings, shortcuts, and screenshots.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker v9 handling asset caching, activation cleanup, and fetch interception.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component managing tabs, service worker updates, online status, auto‑generation of recommendations, radar alerts, and initialization of the learning engine.
frontend/src/components/AIPerformancePan: Displays AI learning statistics for a specific asset or top assets, fetching data from the learning engine and rendering progress, labels, and metrics.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that displays a fallback UI on crashes, detects cache‑related issues, and allows users to clear caches and reload.
frontend/src/components/AssetResearch.ts: Provides asset search and analysis using Binance data, including autocomplete, symbol selection, and predictive confidence panels.
frontend/src/components/DataStatusIndica: Shows real‑time data status, errors, staleness, and last‑update info with retry options based on useDataStatus hook results.
frontend/src/components/DynamicAlerts.ts: Generates temporary UI alerts for new radar signals and high‑confidence recommendations, respecting user preferences and favourites.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai using lucide-react icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with title and optional PWA install buttons tied to installability state.
frontend/src/components/ICPAnalysis.tsx: Shows detailed ICPUSDT market analysis with loading, no‑data, and styled bullish/bearish states.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: Provides a timed PWA install prompt with dismiss logic and fallback to the install dialog.
frontend/src/components/MarketCard.tsx: Displays a selectable market summary card with price, change, volume, and confidence indicators.
frontend/src/components/MarketOverview.t: Shows a scrollable list of MarketCards and detailed analysis for the selected market with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/PredictiveConfid: Renders a confidence indicator for predictive analysis, with dynamic colors, badges, and progress visualization based on confidence level.
frontend/src/components/PWADiagnosticsVi: Displays detailed PWA diagnostics including display mode, install status, and refresh controls.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallDialog: Displays a dialog guiding users through installing the PWA, with different instructions and actions for iOS and non‑iOS devices.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallStatus: Shows current PWA installability and display mode, offering install actions and status details depending on platform and state.
frontend/src/components/RadarDashboard.t: Generates and displays radar alerts based on market anomalies, with filtering, confidence thresholds, and new‑alert detection animations.
frontend/src/components/ResetFromScratch: Provides a confirmation dialog to fully reset local data and reload the app, showing progress and error toasts.
frontend/src/components/TabFetchErrorSta: Displays an error state for tab data loading, including error details, PWA cache warnings, and a reload button.
frontend/src/components/ThemeProvider.ts: Manages app theme state, syncing it with localStorage and applying corresponding CSS classes to the document root.
frontend/src/components/TopRecommendatio: Displays top asset recommendations using market and recommendation data, handling loading and error states and rendering detailed recommendation cards. Fetches combined analysis and shows alerts when recommendations are unavailable.
Provides UI for managing theme, alerts, learning prioritization, and favorite assets with localStorage persistence. Integrates PWA tools and market data for asset selection.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/analysisEnric: Computes enriched technical analysis for a ticker including trend, strength, predictions, confidence, and detection of manipulation and institutional zones. Integrates learningEngine to adjust confidence and generate tags.
Fetches Binance Futures USD‑M market data and individual asset data with error handling for network issues and restricted responses. Also provides a filter for major trading pairs.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/learningInteg: Records and updates AI learning predictions from market data, optionally prioritizing user‑favorite assets. Interacts with learningEngine to store predictions and update asset stats.
Generates bullish-based recommendations and anomaly-driven radar alerts using market trends, strength, confidence, and volume/price deviations. Sorts and filters assets to produce concise signal outputs.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/unifiedSnapsh: Validates and transforms backend UnifiedSnapshot data into enriched BinanceMarketData with technical analysis.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and state management for Internet Identity authentication, login, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWADiagnostics.ts: Runs checks on PWA installability, service worker status, manifest, icons, and reports issues and readiness state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstall.ts: Tracks install prompt events, device conditions, install state, and provides functions to trigger or dismiss PWA installation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines types and React Query hooks for fetching Binance data, enriching it with technical analysis, and integrating learning logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerUpdat: React hook that detects service worker updates and exposes a method to trigger skip-waiting and reload.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom OKLCH theme variables and neon/cyber-dark theme definitions with background effects.
frontend/src/lib/learningEngine.ts: IndexedDB‑backed engine for storing predictions, computing stats, and managing adaptive learning config for assets.
frontend/src/lib/resetFromScratch.ts: Utility that clears IndexedDB, caches, localStorage, and service workers to fully reset the app state.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app with Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, themes, radii, shadows, and enabling plugins like typography and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project architecture, current issues, and high‑level state for the Crypto Market Assistant PWA.
